description:
Modern version control: Mercurial internals

Presented by Dirkjan Ochtman

In this talk, I'd like to talk a bit about Mercurial. This will not be a
beginner-level talk on DVCS or hg; it aims to be a higher-level
discussion of the concepts employed in Mercurial. After having discussed
these, I'd also like to compare Mercurial and git based on UI,
performance and underlying concepts.
title: Modern version control: Mercurial internals (#113)
